item.title: About
item.description:
About me

Xin chao/Hi 👋, My name is Anh Nhat Tran (Na).

I’m currently work as a Backend Developer in Hanoi, Vietnam. My work mostly focused on web development using Go, Javascript, SQL, and AWS.

Outside work, I’m a Powerlifter 🏋🏻‍, and a Blogger.

Connect with me 📫

The blog doesn’t support comment feature if you find an error or anything interesting, please DM me on Facebook or LinkedIn.

Happy reading

Books I’m currently reading

I use goodreads to track my reading progress and my book review. The list below is the books I’m currently reading.

  • Julia Child và cuộc sống ở Pháp by Julia Child (⭐️4)
  • Marie Sến by Phạm Thị Hoài (⭐️3.53)
  • HTTP/2 in Action by Barry Pollard (⭐️4.36)
  • How Emotions Are Made: The Secret Life of the Brain by Lisa Feldman Barrett (⭐️4.22)
  • High Performance MySQL by Silvia Botros (⭐️4.2)
  • Head First Design Patterns by Eric Freeman (⭐️4.48)
  • Cracking the Coding Interview: 189 Programming Questions and Solutions 6th Edition by Gayle Laakmann McDowell McDowell (⭐️4.51)
  • Matthew Hussey - How to talk to Men:59 Secret Scripts To Melt His Heart, Unlock What He’s Thinking, And Make Him Want To Be With You Forever by Matthew Hussey (⭐️3.52)
  • The Staff Engineer's Path by Tanya Reilly (⭐️4.2)
  • Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code by Martin Fowler (⭐️4.23)
